sentences.sContent: But some plants, including maize and sorghum, have evolved to use a type called C4.
sentences.sContent_eng: But some plants, including maize and sorghum, have evolved to use a type called C4.
sentences.sCn: 但是一些植物，包括玉米和高粱，进化成了使用C4型的光合作用。

synos.tran: [作物]高粱；蜀黍；甜得发腻的东西

trans.tranOther: a type of grain that is grown in tropical areas
